message_1: A company wants to encrypt a message using a columnar transposition cipher with a matrix size of 5x6. The message contains 30 characters. Determine how many empty spaces will be left in the last row of the matrix.
message_2: The matrix size is 5x6, which means it has a total of 5 * 6 = 30 spaces. Since the message contains 30 characters and the matrix has 30 spaces, there will be no empty spaces left in the last row of the matrix.
